-ory.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a place or thing that is used for doing something
-ory.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: an observatory  (=a place from where people watch something, especially the stars)
-ory.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: describes something that does a particular thing
-ory.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: an explanatory note  (=that gives an explanation)
